kpi_info.title: PRB utilization of CRE UEs in DL ABS sub-frames per TTI Level 8
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of ABS sub-frames of CRE UEs with a PRB utilization range of 70 % < x <= 80 %. The PRB utilization is defined as the ratio of used PRB per ABS sub-frame compared to the total number of PRBs for dynamic scheduling of user plane traffic in the same TTI. Note: "CRE UEs" are UEs located in the range expansion area of the small cell.
